name: Notion OKRs dashboard
description: Do you feel like you or your business lack direction? You and your team are working hard everyday but don't really have a clear picture of how that work is going to help you reach your goals?Then adopting OKRs as a goal setting framework can help you!What are OKRsOKRs stands for Objectives and Key Results and is a popular goal-setting framework, created by Intel and popularised by Google. Objectives are the goals you want to achieve, the place where you want to go. They’re ambitious and challeng
features: Objectivesare the goals you want to achieve, the place where you want to go. They’re ambitious and challenging.; Key Resultsare the “how” you get to that place. They’re the actions you will take to reach those goals. They are measurable and time bound.; Single-level OKRswhich contains a single level of objectives and key results. This is best suited for individuals or a very small business.; Quarters, Objectives and Key Results databases; Main dashboard with Quarter and Annual Views of your goals, aggregate view of OKRs and Progress tracker for your Key Results by Status and by Owner (for multi-level version); Written step-by-step guide on how to use the Simple OKRs version; Youtube Video tutorial on how to use the multi-level OKRs version; Who is this template for?; How do I get access to this template?
